title: "Disco nunu"
body:
He said that is not his/her account. When he/she said that i thought he could be a booster and if i remeber that's bannable
Anyway i dont want him banned or something like that. Atleast a warn, because is not a good thing to troll in rankes.
I was premade with a guy (mid) he said that he was reconding he didint, he wanted to scare him so we can dodge 
Yes the game got dodge... lucky.... but still if my friend wasent there to say that he is "recording" we could dodge the game and we will suffer the 15-30 min game+ losing 19-25 lp
Screenshots: http://prntscr.com/iu7pbh Screenshot2: http://prntscr.com/iu7ppj

replies.body:
I would recommend omitting all the names in the pictures besides your own, as while you aren't inherently calling them out on the issue, they are still associated with the post.

I could be wrong though, as the board rules only state that naming and shaming isn't allowed. I just don't want you to get into any major hassle. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
Well i hided the name for every persone even me. Why is still rule idk, but i did it. And i respect it{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

maybe he's just into disco and likes Nunu, stop bullying him OP
{{sticker:sg-lulu}}
